name: Intelligence (itch)
description:
Intelligence is a short game made for Ludum Dare 50.

How does it fit the theme? (Delay the inevitable):

You need to delay humans from becoming too smart and destroying themselves.

What is it about?:

I guess you'll have to play!

How to play?:

(This is also explained in the tutorial section of the menu)

Start events that deplete the IQ of humans. Keep it below 1000 (or the custom limit set in the menu) to stop them from destroying themselves.

How was it made?:

I'll be making a youtube video soon, but the software I used:

Photoshop - Art

Godot - Game Making

Bosca Ceoil - Music (It's bus-ka-k-yo-ill btw)

OBS Studio -Recording (youtube)

Audacity - Voice (youtube)

All of these are free, except for photoshop, but there are many alternatives out there, like GIMP.

Notes:

The default IQ to lose is unrealistic. I reccomend playing at 180.
